评论详情: It's thick, soft, and good quality. Well worth the money.

This cardigan is really beautiful! It’s thick and made well! It’s almost more like a sweater coat weight. Can be worn alone with a cami underneath or as a sweater coat in the spring and fall.  Love it!! I did return it for size. I purchased a small, my normal size, but I wanted it to come down a but longer. I’m 5’6” and 110-115 lbs. I also wanted that really oversized look like the model in the photos. The small definitely works but I just like sweaters really big so I can wrap them around if I’m cold. When returning for size I ended up ordering 3 colors so I could compare and see which I like best! They have so many beautiful colors! Unfortunately I’ve heard Amazon is cracking doen on returns. I hope nit because without an actual storefront you really have to order multiple sizes and colors to try on. This is my first time purchasing from Dokotoo and if all of their products are of this quality I will be ordering more!

This sweater is absolutely adorable! It resembles the picture perfectly, with vibrant colors and a cozy fit. The quality is impressive, especially when compared to various outfits I've tried. I'm genuinely delighted with my purchase and excited to wear it!
Great find! Didn't expect the quality and the weight of the sweater. Perfect for cooler southern winter days
The thickness of this sweater is so comfy and warm. I absolutely love this!
Such a great sweater

I have received so many compliments on this sweater when I wear it out! It is so cute and looks exactly as pictured. The material is good quality and thick. It is slightly oversized. Would definitely recommend!

I gave this 5 stars because it has a thicker material than I was expecting and is made pretty well. Doesn't come apart easily and very soft. I like the slightly oversized look of it on. If you don't like it that way then you should size down.

Who says you cant be fashionable in the cold.  I absolutely adore this cardigan. The pattern is unique, it's thick, heavy and soft.  I love the grey and white and have received compliments.  Compliments are nice.....

Love this sweater! Perfect for the holidays or whenever. Nice thick material.

Buttons are top grade and fit was spot on. I am 5’6 155 and got a large with just enough room. I am not an influencer and did pay for this myself. I love it and love the color as well.
This is amazing quality, super soft and luxurious- I didn’t have high hopes but I was still very impressed. It’s absolutely adorable too!

I debated between a large or medium and decided on the large, for reference I'm 5'1" and 166lbs. The large had that perfect cozy fit, it's not a heavy, thick cardigan but I'd say it's perfect without being too bulky. I received so many compliments wearing this cardigan, I even had a girl stop me and asked if I wouldn't mind sharing where I bought it from then brought it up on her phone and purchased it. This cardigan is THAT good.

Either get your regular size, go up one, or go down one. Whatever you decide just buy it. It’s kinda thick but it looks great! The colors are very vibrant and they are very well made. I’ve gotten so many compliments on these sweaters. I have the brown/tan, green, and pink.
This top is so comfortable and cute. It is perfect with jeans or leggings. The color is exactly as pictured. The fabric is warm and soft as well!

I bought an extra large for an oversized look. Loved the outcome. The sweater is heavy & has a stretch but not to where it’ll lose shape. Order it! I have two. Green & caramel. Can’t wait to wear again
Fits well, Quality is amazing and love the style and weight to it. It’s definitely worth your money

The sweater fits oversized.  The buttons are a wooden material and high quality.  Overall, I think this was a great purchase!
